body.name: Beneath the Beastly Duke's Mask: A Historical Regency Romance Novel

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two unforgettable characters hoping against hope that they have a HEA
reviews.reviewText: What a wonderful story! It is anchored by the lovely and loving heroine following her own heart and the beleaguered Duke who is a true hero suffering following his heroic acts. Arabella, seeing with her pure heart, treats the Duke as a normal person, not a person subsumed by his scars. His craving for normality and her recognition of his own gentle and kind nature draws them together into love despite a number of unusual hurdles to leap. There is even a lovely twist in the end – and a stronger than usual HEA. So Lovely! Thank you so much for writing such an exceptional book. The story is outstanding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Henry and Arabella
reviews.reviewText: This story involves two characters, each carrying secrets. Arabella chooses to work as a maid for a duke she knew had scars inside and out. Henry hires Arabella as a maid, and finds her effervescent, strong-willed personality very appealing. Their friendship blossoms, and then the author strategically weaves in drama and mystery. As they attempt to keep their relationship a secret, events occur testing their resolve and future. It is a clean romance, with strong characters, and well-defined foundation for the plot. The author did a great job in creating conflict in the form of betrayals, manipulations, and surprises.I enjoyed the story, but some areas were slightly puzzling to me. Without disclosing spoilers, I was expecting a different outcome when it came to the introduction of a relative, and I personally didn’t feel closure with two characters that had a dramatic role early in the story. I received a complimentary ARC, but I am voluntarily offering my personal opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The story of Arabella and Nicholas shows how important true love can be. She fell in love with him in spite of his burned scars and she new that there was a secret in his life, and when the truth that he was not the Duke every one thought he was, his kind heart and Arabella's love and help opened a new life for them and their family. Great book Abigail !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderfully complex novel
reviews.reviewText: Arabella is the daughter of a Lady - who was disowned by her titled father for marrying a commoner who was a physician. Her mother raised her as a Lady but without a title and she was kind and compassionate to everyone. After her parents death, she takes a job working for a local Duke.Henry - nee Nicholas Smith - was the Duke by adoption and was raised by the Duke and Duchess that he saved from a horrible fire that caused him to have scars all over his body but especially his face.What will happen once Arabella and Nicholas as there are people plotting against them?Wonderful book, relatable characters and with many twists and turns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed this intriguing tale. Abigail Agar spins another enchanting regency romance that takes the reader on a wonderful journey. I loved Arabella the most in this book. It's a great page turning novel and I am happy to have read it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The heroine is a compassionate lady who must find her own way in live now that her physician father and “lady” mother are gone. She finds work at the duke’s home. The hero, the duke, is a recluse due to the scars he has and he is an adopted son. They are drawn to each other by their kind natures. A scheming cousin adds some drama to the story. The main characters are very likable and get their HEA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful love story with a twist
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed the twists in the story. Henry was kind but hides because of his awful scars; Arabella is a vivacious commoner who looks beneath the surface. The development of their friendships and the obstacles put in the way of their happily ever after made for a very interesting read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: An excellent easy to read story, well written, with wonderful characters and attention to detail. A romances full of facing betrayal, shocking truths, and a scheming cousin, they stay together, ready to forge their own destiny. And a happily ever after. Glad they loved the way everything turned out.

Sweet story with an unusual ending. But a very happy ending regardless . Arabella is so sweet that Henry could not prevent from falling in love with her. He is scarred from a fire and only Arabella saw beyond those scars of what a truly gentle and kind man he was. Lovely book and easy to read.
